short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provide a way to do a quick search into the bookmarks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hey ! 

Thanks to gBookmark-searcher, you will easily be able to filter your bookmarks. It will help you to go to the page quickly. 

I Highly recommand you to create a shortcut to open this extension (like ALT + B) 
You can do it in the bottom of the chrome extension page.


Each seconds is a gift, so let's win some time by using this extension :P

Regards
